## CrudFeatures.emptyValue property

The value used by the database to store properties set to `undefined`<!-- -->. Typically, SQL databases store both `undefined` and `null` as `null`<!-- -->.

Default: `undefined`

**Signature:**

```typescript
emptyValue: undefined | null;
```
